subject: Horses
Horsemanship and Equestrian Events
lead_paragraph: More than 3,000 horses and 2,200 competitive equestrians descend on Saugerties, N.Y., every summer, and the influx of cash has played a part in transforming the village.
snippet: More than 3,000 horses and 2,200 competitive equestrians descend on Saugerties, N.Y., every summer, and the influx of cash has played a part in transforming the village.
